item.title: Fashion recognition
item.description: During quarantine, some friends and me decided to tackle a exciting project. It was centered around training a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to recognize certain fashion articles in Instagram pictures. The final goal was to find relevant posts from influencers and create a keyword which potentially generates more traffic the next days and can be used for GoogleAdWords Marketing. We started with the Google Open Image Database and trained a Yolo-V3 CNN in Google Colab to recognize different fashion articles (e.

item.title: My experience with Working Out Loud (WOL)
item.description: During my last internship, I got to learn a lot of awesome things. Besides slide-building and clear communication, I was exposed to the Working Out Loud (WOL) method by John Stepper. WOL is a method, where a few people come together to form a so-called circle.
